name: Weihang Wang 0001
content: Weihang Wang @ University of Southern California Weihang Wang WiSE Gabilan Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science University of Southern California GCS 505K, 1031 Downey Way, Los Angeles, CA 90089, USA weihangw /at/ usc.edu Home Publications Teaching Students Services Menu I am a WiSE Gabilan Assistant Professor of Computer Science at the University of Southern California. I am broadly interested in artificial intelligence and software engineering, with a growing passion for using AI to bridge computational and biomedical sciences and help accelerate drug discovery and repurposing. I'm grateful that my research has been recognized with several awards, including N2Women Rising Stars in Networking and Communications (2024), University at Buffalo Exceptional Scholar - Young Investigator Award (2022), NSF CAREER Award (2021), Facebook Testing and Verification Research Award (2019), Mozilla Research Award (2019), and Maurice H. Halstead Memorial Research Award (2018). Updates 01/2025: Two papers accepted to WWW 2025. 08/2024: Really honored to be recognized as one of the 10 N2Women Rising Stars in Networking and Communications. 07/2024: Many thanks to NSF for supporting our research on developing a static analysis framework for WebAssembly! 05/2024: One paper accepted to ICML 2024. 01/2024: One paper accepted to WWW 2024.
